name: Similac
0:
”Alexa, open Similac”
”Alexa, ask Similac for feeding tips”
”Alexa, ask Similac for the tip of the day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: similac
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the Similac Voice Skill for Amazon Alexa. We promise to help keep your baby fed, happy and healthy and to give you the tools to track, ask and get answers - all with your voice.

Just say 'Alexa, open Similac' to get:

- Baby feeding tips, including how to make a bottle, common feeding issues, and information about breastfeeding and supplementing
- Help finding the right Similac product to nourish your baby

You can also sign up for daily tips and ideas for bonding with baby and encouraging their development.

Discussion of medical and health topics should never be construed as medical advice. You are advised to contact a healthcare professional in your area if you need medical advice. Abbott does not represent that the information on Abbott’s channels is accurate, complete, reliable, useful, timely or current. You read all content at your own risk. Do not rely on the information or advice in any of these postings. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
